rule.name: AUG_createRequestForm
rule.definition: =load( local!entity:#"_a-0000dcac-e5ea-8000-b475-010000010000_3821"(ri!entityId), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout"( label: "Create Request for "&local!entity.name, instructions: "Please enter the request details after which the request will be routed for approval.", firstColumnContents: { #"_a-0000dcac-e5ea-8000-b475-010000010000_3818"(entity:local!entity,twoColumns:true,showLink:true), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Request Details", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Title", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!request.name, saveInto: ri!request.name, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", required: true, validations: #"_a-0000dcac-e5ea-8000-b475-010000010000_3784"(ri!request.name,#"_a-0000dcae-418e-8000-b475-010000010000_3947") ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Description", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!request.description, saveInto: ri!request.description, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", required: true, height: "MEDIUM", validations: #"_a-0000dcac-e5ea-8000-b475-010000010000_3784"(ri!request.description,#"_a-0000dcae-418e-8000-b475-010000010000_3949") ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Category", labelPosition: "ABOVE", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: #"6447e6c1-b5f1-48d6-901c-59d3176ce46d"(), choiceValues: #"6447e6c1-b5f1-48d6-901c-59d3176ce46d"(), value: ri!request.category, saveInto: ri!request.category, required: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(instructions:#"_a-0000dcb6-074e-8000-b475-010000010000_4021",readOnly:true) }, secondColumnContents: {} ) }, secondColumnContents: {}, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"( label: "Submit Request", style: "PRIMARY", value: #"_a-0000dcac-e5ea-8000-b475-010000010000_3815", saveInto: ri!button ) }, secondaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"( label: "Cancel", style: "NORMAL", value: #"_a-0000dcac-e5ea-8000-b475-010000010000_3780", saveInto: ri!button, skipValidation: true ) } ), validations: {} ) )
